Treasure hunt
Main Skill: Foraging
Max Efficiency: 120%

The Adventurer's Guild has set a challenge to find some special items around the Horn of Respite. How long will it take you to find them all?

The Treasure hunt activity is a Foraging activity.

Location

This activity can be done at the following location:

  • Horn of Respite in Jarvonia

Visibility

This activity is always visible.

Requirement

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Foraging lvl. 20.

Secondary Drops

Each of the secondary drops is rolled independently of the others.
